localizedText.DESC_RUNTIMES: An ADS connection is established to all enabled runtimes.
localizedText.RUNTIME_STATE_CHECK_TIMEOUT: Maximum timeout for determining the runtime status
localizedText.RESPONSE_SIZE_LIMIT: Limit response size of ADS requests
localizedText.SUM_REQUEST_LIMIT: Limit the number of ADS requests that can be bundled in one sum request
localizedText.NEW_HANDLES_PER_SUM_REQUEST_LIMIT: Limit the number of ADS handles created by a sum request
localizedText.ENABLE_READ_BEFORE_WRITE: Support incomplete writes by reading before writing
localizedText.HMI_ADS_IMPL_UNREGISTERED_ERROR_CODE: The description for this error-code is missing.
localizedText.TWINCAT_ONLINE_CHANGE: Online change of runtime {0} detected. Counter changed from {1} to {2}.
localizedText.TWINCAT_SYM_VERSION_CHANGE: Symbol version change detected for runtime {0}. Counter changed from {1} to {2}.
localizedText.TWINCAT_APPINFO_CHANGE: Runtime {0} is connected to project '{2}' of application '{1}' (Compiled at {3})
localizedText.TWINCAT_RUNTIME_ENTER_TIMEOUT_STATE: Network connection of runtime {0} ({1}) timed out. Waiting for runtime to become available again.
localizedText.TWINCAT_RUNTIME_STATUS_CHECK_ERROR: Error while checking the status of runtime {0} ({3}): {2} ({1})
localizedText.TWINCAT_CONNECTED: Connected to the local TwinCAT system
localizedText.TWINCAT_DONGLE: Checking for connected TwinCAT license dongles
localizedText.TWINCAT_DISCONNECTED: Unable to connect to the local TwinCAT system: {1} ({0})
localizedText.DESC_IGNORED_PLC_ATTRIBUTES: Attribute pragmas are added to the JSON schema. The attributes configured here are hidden.
localizedText.DESC_RUNTIME_STATE_CHECK_INTERVAL: The state of each configured runtime is checked periodically.
localizedText.DESC_RUNTIME_STATE_CHECK_TIMEOUT: A configured runtime is considered unreachable if a request takes longer than this timeout.
localizedText.DESC_VISIBLE_RUNTIME_PORTS: Target systems can have many ADS ports. Most are rarely used in HMI projects.
localizedText.DESC_RESPONSE_SIZE_LIMIT: The PLC task is locked for every request. If the request is too large, the PLC cycle time might be exceeded.
localizedText.DESC_SUM_REQUEST_LIMIT: The PLC task is locked for every request. If a sum request contains too many requests, the PLC cycle time might be exceeded.
localizedText.DESC_NEW_HANDLES_PER_SUM_REQUEST_LIMIT: TwinCAT's handle buffer is not resized in the middle of a sum request. Creating too many ADS handles in a single sum request causes errors if TwinCAT's handle buffer is full.
localizedText.DESC_ENABLE_READ_BEFORE_WRITE: Variables that are hidden or not set in the write request will be overwritten with an old value. Disable this setting to prevent side-effects and improve performance.
localizedText.DESC_READ_ONLY: Prevents write access to variables and setters, as well as all method calls.
